section.name: Overview
section.p: The Ads Plugin provide VAST capabilities to GWT MediaPlayer.
It consists of the following components:

subsection.name: AdModule
subsection.p: The AdModule configured the entire plugin. It binds the AdService, the VASTParser, as well as the AdPresenter and its view the AdView.
This class is expected to either be extended or replaced with a user-defined one to further customize the setup of this plugin.

subsection.name: AdPresenter
subsection.p: The AdPresenter will control the view and respond to application events to play videos, using the AdView.

subsection.name: AdView
subsection.p: The AdView uses a VideoWidget to play and interact with ads. The VideoWidget is a enriched wrapper around HTML5 video tag.

subsection.name: AdService
subsection.p: The AdService is a server-side component fetching ads. When initializing the plugin, it will fetch ads, parse them and return the results to the client side.
